{"id":628250624,"lang":"java","time":"4 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1643202299,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/628250624/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Make The String Great","memory":"39.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String makeGood(String s) {\n        String ans = \"\";\n        Stack<Character> st = new Stack<>();\n        for(int i =0; i<s.length(); i++){\n            if ( st.size()!=0 &&( (int)(st.peek()-s.charAt(i))==32 || (int)(st.peek()-s.charAt(i))==-32)){\n                st.pop();\n            }\n            else{\n                st.push(s.charAt(i));\n            }\n        }\n        while(st.size()>0 ){\n            ans = st.pop() + ans;\n           //return ans;\n        }\n        return ans;\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"make-the-string-great"}
